text: Périgny, also known as Périgny-sur-Yerres, is a commune. It is in the Val-de- Marne department in France. In 2018, 2,672 people lived there. The commune is in the southeastern suburbs of Paris. It is from the center. == Related pages == * Communes of the Val-de-Marne department == References == Category:Communes in Val-de-Marne
title: Périgny, Val-de-Marne
